feed.title: autobrr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for autobrr: v1.52.0
entry.content:
Changelog

New Features

  • b07556ceaa855db57040f2843fcd657275682217: feat(ci): skip build on misc files (#1854) (@nuxencs)
  • 4c39198c3731002a3d7bc95208291ba958201eb7: feat(indexers): add UploadCX (#1852) (@establish33)
  • 2a9a890e9721d504c7cc379d33be03c7ac125a97: feat(makefile): add tmux-based dev environment (#1844) (@s0up4200)

Bug fixes

  • ee04c61a543fdfa54bec0eec6b116797f6aaad47: fix(indexers): iPlay RMT update download url (#1849) (@zze0s)

Other work

  • ac1974c8d50fced1cc72be96d72d8debd0dd84ec: build(deps): bump the golang group with 10 updates (#1856) (@dependabot[bot])
  • 97e02d3d796afa274ef5de49cb40d89bef66f7d3: build: add docs update workflow trigger (#1846) (@s0up4200)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autobrr/autobrr/compare/v1.51.1...v1.52.0

Docker images

  • docker pull ghcr.io/autobrr/autobrr:v1.52.0

What to do next?

  • Read the documentation
  • Join our Discord server

entry.title: New release for autobrr: v1.53.0
entry.content:
Changelog

New Features

  • f644b3a4d648c5680cc86c80b7aeed91e34d2bc7: feat(filters): implement AnnounceType (#1837) (@zze0s)
  • 24f31574e5bf1c3dadf6d403d2ad23db24b4576c: feat(indexers): update PTP announce to new format (#1738) (@zze0s)
  • ab718b82328a5eee66ec5d60b5829880efca9b8f: feat(macros): add Description (#1863) (@nsenica)
  • ec85d53d8f2bf414856cd12e9740d141c7a830c1: feat(web): migrate react-table to v8 (#1866) (@zze0s)
  • 172fa651afb9b1d608d47c9c5af887cabe0d7b09: feat(web): replace react-portal with own implementation (#1862) (@zze0s)

Bug fixes

  • 99a9e6bc0f7dca3a0188feaadaf3b7b6a2dd32f4: fix(http): downgrade canOnboard check to warning log level (#1859) (@s0up4200)
  • a6b463fb697814d6d4913db24547ce08530cbf35: fix(web): honor baseURL path when logging out (#1851) (@martylukyy)

Other work

  • 66696dcb18c21809bb3b4f6a15e9d569ab86b0c9: build(deps): bump the npm group across 1 directory with 27 updates (#1847) (@dependabot[bot])

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autobrr/autobrr/compare/v1.52.0...v1.53.0

Docker images

  • docker pull ghcr.io/autobrr/autobrr:v1.53.0

What to do next?

  • Read the documentation
  • Join our Discord server

entry.title: New release for autobrr: v1.54.0
entry.content:
Changelog

New Features

  • 21b768aed8c47eb42bd7c64ee638b4c0c01a5141: feat(indexers): add PrivateSilverScreen (#1871) (@s0up4200)

Bug fixes

  • 96f61a90e5962f1497f277a3453fbe465a6b5ac8: fix(database): SQLite try reindexing on integrity check error (#1877) (@zze0s)
  • 81ce8acb2bc853c5ec31acef2e1aee35fad237da: fix(releases): search by group (#1876) (@KyleSanderson)

Other work

entry.title: New release for autobrr: v1.55.0
entry.content:
Changelog

New Features

  • 43c28fc0c6c400d247081f2d116ced73aed85ff8: feat(auth): implement auth proxy support with OpenID Connect (#1853) (@s0up4200)
  • c1d8a4a8503cb6010d49ea7b621e73f7cbc6c62f: feat(cache): implement TTLCache and TimeCache (#1822) (@KyleSanderson)
  • acef4ac624c4c1ade094851dcb4efd96502971e5: feat(filters): RED and OPS fetch uploader from API (#1348) (@alekc)
  • 4432dfb09971dee90624a7a38ffa0a9efd7d64e6: feat(http): implement proper BaseUrl support to coexist with legacy mode (#1298) (@kaiserbh)
  • 04c4bd482f60f89155e58521c1c60527f6df332b: feat(releases): improve freeleech parsing (#1880) (@zze0s)
  • d8f578b5ead099f487b24c9c3f69d6d5b044ea79: feat(web): vendor react-hot-toast (#1883) (@zze0s)

Bug fixes

  • b68ae334cad6244f64e564db1ca00d00e2b9a200: fix(http): init oidc handler if enabled (#1888) (@zze0s)
  • f6891bf9a3123b23cfec8730149b6418cbd14468: fix(indexers): PrivateSilverScreen freeleech parsing (#1879) (@zze0s)
  • 80423d62735e8e49e41563e17c3a326afe93938a: fix(web): circular dependencies (#1882) (@zze0s)
  • e0b4e8bbc814a18ee80512dbf68a83959e8f2187: fix(web): feed and IRC menu out of bounce (#1887) (@martylukyy)

Other work

  • 31f7977f54e73b58337c3ac0501a5396d4c0b3b9: build(deps): bump the npm group across 1 directory with 23 updates (#1884) (@dependabot[bot])

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autobrr/autobrr/compare/v1.54.0...v1.55.0

Docker images

  • docker pull ghcr.io/autobrr/autobrr:v1.55.0

What to do next?

  • Read the documentation
  • Join our Discord server
